channel.title: My client won't pickup keypresses
channel.description:
Well I am working on a client right now and I seem to have come across an issue, it won't pick up keypresses. Basically all I did so far was disable drawing when not in focus(Cause it's a tabbed client) and wrap it in a JFrame, I don't see any potential reason why it won't register keypresses. If anyone has experienced a similar issue and can help let me know, thanks.
EDIT: I figured it out, the keylistener has to be attached to the tabbed pane then just only recognize keypresses when the client tab is in focus.

item.title: My client won't pickup keypresses
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

In the Applet_Sub1 class the mouse and key listeners are instantiated in a new thread. Try removing them from the unfocused clients and reassign them to the active tab.
